Navigate to Export&Import tool /common/uobject.jsp?object=3021058356013487092
Click "Start Import Session"
Click "Choose file"
Select file "generic object Price Component.zip"
Click "Upload"
In import options select the following values:
	Update extra objects -> Yes
	Update all params of all objects -> Yes, remove extra params
	Update name and description of objects -> Yes
Click "Save"
Then Click "Proceed"
Once import is completed, navigate to /tools/db150.jsp

Paste the following script:


update nc_params set list_value_id = 9132718859613059073
where attr_id = 9132718859613059064
and object_id in
(9165753780166130789,
9165709210293639536,
9165745132601984630,
9165745051658130424,
9165753683146038563,
9165745212076984646,
9165743997491038141,
9165884687361163063,
9165884880488163100,
9165885000341163107,
9165885075191160701,
9165891978524163192,
9165892023224160786,
9165754422866130804,
9165892014344163196,
9165755215405038575,
9165884800302777487,
9165892050088160796,
9165892053975163215,
9165754689777130812,
9165762248779131080,
9165709797014639557,
9165896766947163237,
9165709230711639544,
9165892046200160792,
9165884778421160655,
9165884839099163088,
9165755649988985059,
9165892033334777620,
9165755560696130821,
9165892037435777624,
9165755486472985053,
9165892030512777617)

Press F8

Perform BOE Cache Reset.
